<h3 id="X38024">X(38024) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(2), X(7)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3-10*(b+c)*a^2-(-5*b^2+18*b*c-5*c^2)*a+4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38024) = 5*X(1)+4*X(5880) = X(1)+2*X(6173) = X(1)+8*X(25557) = 4*X(2)-X(5223) = X(2)+2*X(5542) = X(7)+2*X(551) = 4*X(142)-X(3679) = X(5223)+8*X(5542) = 3*X(5223)-8*X(38101) = 3*X(5542)+X(38101) = 2*X(5880)-5*X(6173) = X(5880)-10*X(25557) = X(6173)-4*X(25557) = 2*X(11038)+X(38052) = X(11038)+2*X(38054) = 3*X(11038)+X(38092) = 3*X(11038)+2*X(38094) = 7*X(11038)+2*X(38201) = 3*X(19875)-2*X(38097) = 2*X(38030)+X(38036) = X(38030)+2*X(38041) = X(38036)-4*X(38041) = 3*X(38093)-X(38097)</b>
<p>X(38024) lies on these lines: {1,528}, {2,5223}, {7,551}, {30,38030}, {142,3679}, {515,38073}, {516,30392}, {517,38065}, {518,3921}, {519,11038}, {524,38046}, {527,17561}, {529,38056}, {535,4321}, {537,27475}, {952,38080}, {971,38021}, {1001,37587}, {1125,6172}, {2801,7988}, {2951,20330}, {3243,4677}, {3582,10398}, {3622,30424}, {3653,5762}, {3656,31657}, {4355,11111}, {5045,5696}, {5220,34595}, {5249,30350}, {5735,30389}, {5843,38022}, {5845,38023}, {5850,19883}, {5851,38026}, {5852,38027}, {10072,30330}, {10582,31164}, {11240,30343}, {11274,20119}, {13159,15678}, {14151,38207}, {15709,38130}, {18421,30379}, {19876,20195}, {21151,28194}, {28204,38107}</p>
<p>
X(38024) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (19875, 38093), (25055, 38053), (38092, 38094)<br>
X(38024) = anticomplement of X(38101)<br>
X(38024) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (11038, 38054, 38052), (38030, 38041, 38036), (38092, 38094, 38052), (38095, 38096, 38080)<br>
</p>
